name: Utkal Youth Association For Social Development(UYASD)
briefDescription: UTKAL YOUTH ASSOCIATION FOR SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT is product of solution towards inequalities, injustice, marginalization and deprivation of masses in the society. It is a non-profit making, secular, cultural and social organization. UYASD is a 1st generation organization working for the benefit of the poor and down-trodden people. The organization is registered under the Indian Societies Act XXI of 1860 bearing the registration no. 22191/172 of 2005-06. The mission and vision of the organization is to improve the quality of life of the people through intervention in the field of social, economic and political equality for all with special emphasis on empowerment of women and poverty eradication in the community for sustainable development.
